entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries. Rain at times mixed with snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain at times mixed with snow ending overnight then cloudy. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the morning. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 27 December 2022
